meanings.definition: The desire to promote the welfare of others, expressed especially by the generous donation of money to good causes.
meanings.sent1: Many people show their philanthropies by donating to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: The community greatly benefits from the philanthropies of generous individuals.
meanings.sent3: His philanthropies knew no bounds, as he even donated his favorite toys to the local shelter.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a garden of philanthropies, blooming with kindness and generosity.
meanings.sent5: The impact of her philanthropies was like a beacon of hope in the darkest of times.

meanings.definition: An organization seeking to promote the welfare of others, typically through the donation of money, resources, or time.
meanings.sent1: The philanthropies in our city work tirelessly to support various charitable causes.
meanings.sent2: Many philanthropies collaborate to address community needs more effectively.
meanings.sent3: The philanthropies held a bake sale to raise funds, but ended up eating most of the cookies themselves!
meanings.sent4: Their philanthropies stood as pillars of support in times of crisis, holding the community together.
meanings.sent5: The impact of their philanthropies was like a symphony of compassion, touching hearts far and wide.
